name: Learn Unity
tagline: Scripts for an upcoming Unity book
body:
### Learn Unity for iOS Game Development

The book is current available as an alpha on the Apress site:

http://www.apress.com/9781430248750

Questions and discussion on the Unity forum:

http://forum.unity3d.com/threads/173210-Learn-Unity-for-iOS-Game-Development

@technicat
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
